alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 3:12PM EST until November 09 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...LIGHT WINTRY MIX LEADING TO SLICK TRAVEL THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 3 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch, sleet accumulations up to one tenth of an inch, and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Sullivan, Northern Grafton, Southern Grafton, and Cheshire Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 3 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy road conditions, expect slippery road conditions. A period of mixed precipitation is expected with air temperatures remaining below freezing. Even light snow, sleet, and ice amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton; Sullivan
